author: darkstaff88
content: Hey guys! i participated in KZG ceremony, it says that my address has already contributed but i can't see it in contributions list. Has anyone faced such a problem?

author: potuz
content: The search box in ethereum.org does not find anything for "kzg" and not a single relevant link for "ceremony"

author: bridge-bot
content:
<nicoserranop> > <nicoserranop>  It might be caused by the blacklist. If the sequencer gave you a spot to contribute and you took more time than expected (3 min) then it would include your address in the blacklist to prevent spam attacks.


We are flushing out the list every down and then, I could tell how when it is done so you can safely contribute again ðŸ˜Š (re @kzg_ceremony_bot: <Darkstaff88> Hey guys! i participated in KZG ceremony, it says that my address has already contributed but i can't see it in contributions list.
